SELECT l.user_id, l.user_name, l.password, p.user_id, p.gender, p.phone, p.email, p.photo, p.level, p.verified, p.bio FROM user l LEFT JOIN profile p ON l.user_id = p.user_id
WHERE l.user_name = #{username} AND l.password = #{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.user_name, l.password, p.user_id, p.phone, p.gender, p.email, p.photo, p.level p.verified p.bio FROM user l LEFT JOIN profile p ON l.user_id = p.user_id
WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_name, password, user_type) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{userType})
